resources.string:
"● Check status on WhatsApp.
● Open or come back to status saver app.
● Choose photo or video status to download.
● Click on photo or video to preview or click on save button to save.
● You can check your saved status in Second tab (Saved Status)."
if you enjoy this app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won\'t take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!
Tell others what you think about WA Status Saver
